name: Rabbit Simulator (itch)
description:
Created for Ludum Dare 51, Theme: Every Ten Seconds

A group of friends watch a mysterious saved play through of a game shrouded in rumors and secrecy.

CONTENT WARNING: 

* Flashing Images

* Disturbing Imagery (skulls, spiders, eyes, what looks like gore, etc)

* Unreality
You can also play it here: http://farragofiction.com/RabbitSim/  (though the videos will be slow to download and your browser may not support all codecs used).
